name: iridescently
content:
Add to word list

in a way that reflects many bright colours: Below the boat, dozens of squid began flashing iridescently, red-white-red. The beach is grey rather than white, while the water shines iridescently thanks to an oil slick.
More examplesFewer examplesMillions of colourful lights illuminate the night air, shining iridescently through snow-covered bushes and trees and casting a romantic glow. The building has been elegantly reclad in a glass sheath that glimmers iridescently in the sun.
